snippet: What Egypt can learn from the subcontinent’s experience with democracy.
abstract: What Egypt can learn from the subcontinent’s experience with democracy.
lead_paragraph: A few weeks ago, the Indian prime minister appointed Syed Asif Ibrahim, a Muslim, as the new director of India’s Intelligence Bureau, Thomas L. Friedman wrote in The Opinion Pages of The New York Times.

headline.main: Egypt: The Next India or the Next Pakistan?
